bullets.title: Reliability & Standardization
bullets.sentence: Users appreciate that Gatekeeper simply works â€” "it works," "it just works," and it's become "the de-facto standard versus alternatives like Kyverno."

bullets.title: Functionality & Integration
bullets.sentence: Teams value the capabilities it provides, from "advanced admission control" and "policy guardrails/enforcement" to easy "integration into our current build process."
